introData.title: I’m Lazare Kvirtia
introData.description: As a software developer, I design, code, and maintain software applications, ensuring their functionality and performance

dataAbout.title: Software Developer
dataAbout.aboutMe: Professional with experience in software development and sales engineering. I have a year of internship experience in a nuclear engineering center, followed by three years at the Ministry of Internal Affairs as a full-stack software developer. After that, I worked as a sales engineer for a year and a half. Technical expertise, project management, and good communication are among the many skills I possess. I am passionate about contributing to projects that combine technology and innovation.

workTimeline.where: Ministry Of Internal Affairs Of Georgia

dataPortfolio.description: Creation of Back-End software for logical-probabilistic methods of structural analysis of systems
